title: Army aviation
brief_description: The training of light aircraft pilots, members of the 16 Army Light Aircraft Squadron, at R.A.N. and R.A.A.F. stations. Instruction covers all stages from theory to flight in both fixed and rotary winged aircraft, including army applications for spotting, photography, supply dropping, evaluation of wounded and maintenance of aircraft. No other credits available.
